title: Hambini Bottom Bracket Install: Yoeleo R12 Disc Kyroâ€™s House
content: Fresh from YouTube is another Hambini Bottom bracket install. This time in a Yoeleo R12. This is a revision of the R11 bike Frame that The Unabiker had issues with and it highlights the problems of frame tolerances. The bottom bracket is made to much tighter tolerances than the frames they are pushed into.
author: admin
